00040 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {

00042 using namespace RDK2::Profiling;
00043 
00044 void Session::tryConnectTo(Network::NetProtocol protocol, const string& peerName)
00045 {
00046     checkStarted();
00047     if (protocol == Network::TCP_IP) {
00048         if (!repository->tcpManager) {
00049             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Trying to TCP connect with '%s', but there's no TCP manager!", 
00050                 peerName.c_str());
00051         }
00052         else repository->tcpManager->tryConnectTo(peerName, 0);
00053     }
00054     else if (protocol == Network::USAR_WC) {
00055         queuePush("/usarWCClient/in/requestQueue", new RString("CONNECT " + peerName));
00056     }
00057     else {
00058         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Unknown network protocol for connections: %d (%s)",
00059             protocol, Network::netProtocolToString(protocol).c_str());
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Session::tryDisconnectFrom(Network::NetProtocol protocol, const string& peerName)
00064 {
00065     checkStarted();
00066     if (protocol == Network::TCP_IP) {
00067         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("TCP disconnect not yet implemented");
00068     }
00069     else if (protocol == Network::USAR_WC) {
00070         queuePush("/usarWCClient/in/requestQueue", new RString("DISCONNECT " + peerName));
00071     }
00072     else {
00073         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Unknown network protocol for connections: %d (%s)",
00074             protocol, Network::netProtocolToString(protocol).c_str());
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 Network::ConnectionStatus Session::getConnectionStatusWith(Network::NetProtocol protocol, const string& peerName)
00079 {
00080     checkStarted();
00081     if (protocol == Network::TCP_IP) {
00082         if (!repository->tcpManager) {
00083             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Trying to get TCP connection status with '%s', "
00084                 "but there's no TCP manager!", peerName.c_str());
00085             return Network::NOT_CONNECTED;
00086         }
00087         else return repository->tcpManager->getConnectionStatusWith(peerName);
00088     }
00089     else if (protocol == Network::USAR_WC) {
00090         string s = getString("/usarWCClient/out/connectedAgents");
00091         vector<string> agentConns = tokenize(s, " ");
00092         for (size_t i = 0; i < agentConns.size(); i++) {
00093             vector<string> status = tokenize(agentConns[i], ":");
00094             if (status[0] == peerName) {
00095                 return Network::stringToConnectionStatus(status[1]);
00096             }
00097         }
00098         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Unknown agent '%s' protocol USAR_WC", peerName.c_str());
00099         return Network::NOT_CONNECTED;
00100     }
00101     else {
00102         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Unknown network protocol for connections: %d (%s)",
00103             protocol, Network::netProtocolToString(protocol).c_str());
00104         return Network::NOT_CONNECTED;
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 bool Session::getInetAddressOf(const string& name, Network::NetProtocol socketType, InetAddress& address) throw (SessionException)
00109 {
00110     if (name.find(":") != string::npos) {
00111         string addr = name.substr(0, name.find(":"));
00112         short port = atoi(name.substr(name.find(":")+1).c_str());
00113         address = InetAddress(addr, port);
00114         return true;
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         bool found = false;
00118         lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, HERE);
00119         RYellowPages* yp = getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00120         found = yp->getSocketAddress(socketType, name, address);
00121         unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00122         return found;
00123     }
00124 }
